key.name: use-default-font
key.description: Whether to use the system's default fixed width font for the file panels instead of a font specific to gnome-commander. If this option is turned off, then the font named in the "File panes" option will be used instead of the system font.

key.name: panel-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for the file panes. This will only take effect if the "Use Default Font" option is turned off.
